humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the largest focus of invasion over 0.1 cm is 7.5 cm in greatest dimension. Based on the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The tumor size in this report is given as 7.5 cm in greatest dimension, which exceeds the threshold for T3 (>5 cm in greatest dimension). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T3.
